name: Good Job Piston-Bot
description:
Good Job Piston-Bot

Build a little gizmo which can travel to the right!

More detailed instructions are given in-game - press H to toggle the help window.

This game was made for Luxe Jam #1, where we all used a beta version of Luxe, an upcoming game engine!

Be sure to share your favorite creations with me! *

* Or with your friends.  I call second dibs after you share your machines with your friends. By the way: if you've read this far, it means you've already signed an implicit mental contract and it says that you have to share your machines with me. Sorry about that, corporate just told me so.
